Kenzo's armor took most of the weapon fire however the windshield
cracked. Kenzo flew to the left and fired his laser rapidly at her
trying to use maneuverability to his advantage.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Gatara takes the shot in her armoured shoulder plate, then takes to 
> the air herself, blazing away with her combination weapon.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CatMaster o" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> > Kenzo was knocked back and damaged by the bulllets and explosions. 
> He
> > know if he stayed down h would be finished so he ignored his pain 
> and
> > transformed to his helochopter mode taking to the skys. He spun 
> around
> > and fired a laser at Gatara.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > Devilcat/Gatara::
> > > 
> > > "Fool!" Devilcat laughs as the laser strikes ineffectually 
> against 
> > > his energy shield.  "Kill him, will you?  I've got more important 
> > > things to do."
> > > 
> > > As Devilcat flies to another area to the battlefield, Gatara 
> advances 
> > > on Kenzo, firing a barrage of machine-gun bullets and grenades.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CatMaster o" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> > > > Kenzo:
> > > > 
> > > > Seeing Wheeljack-X get shot Kenzo transformed his finger into a 
> > > laser
> > > > and fired back at Devilcat.
